review: I've bought and returned two of these. I also have two Roku boxes, and just bought a Chromecast.  I'm on a quest to find a way to stream Time Warner video on demand, which I thought would be possible by streaming the TWC websit via Airplay, but the video is choppy and the resolution sucks. I see no reason to buy the ATV over the Roku other than desktop mirroring. Virtually all the limited iPad app content is available via Roku for less money, and there's much more content. The Apple UI is somewhat prettier, with no ads, but that's about it. I'm disappointed that after all this time Apple has not paid more attention to the ATV. Rumor has it that a new version will be released in October, so perhaps that will make it worthwhile. But until that happens, I really can't recommend it.
